attributes.action: Ban the release of the film Corpus Christi in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel the upcoming film titled Corpus Christi should be banned from release in the uk. As Christians we object greatly and are deeply offended by a film showing jesus christ and his diciples as homosexuals.
Even if you are not christian and you may be another religion we are sure you would not accept a person of significance to you being misconstructed.
 I Hope we can count on you for your signature
many thanks. 
the christian body

rejection.details: Please visit British Board of Film Classification http://www.bbfc.co.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
